page.title: 14SHOPS IN GROVE
page.content: THERE ARE SIXTEEN SHOPS IN GROVE AND MOST OF THEM SELL FOOD.IN MILLBROOK SQUARE ARE GATEWAYS SUPERMARKET,DRY CLEANERS, BUILDING SOCIETY,CHEMIST,LLOYDS BANK, BARCLAYS BANK,SMITHS DIY,BULLS SUPER- MARKET,NSS NEWSAGENTS,BUTCHERS,GREEN- GROCERS,ANNES WOOL SHOP,OFF LICENCE, HAIRDRESSER AND FISH SHOP. SOME SHOPS HAVE SPECIAL LAWS, FOR INSTANCE:THE OFF LICENCE AND CHEMIST.MOST SHOPS ARE OPEN MONDAY TO SATURDAY. THE USUAL OPENING HOURS ARE 9.00 TO 17.30 OR 18.00 .THE OFF LICENCE HAS DIFFERENT OPENING HOURS SO DOES THE FISH AND CHIP SHOP. MOST PEOPLE THINK THE SHOPS ARE CONVENIENT TO THEM.THE MILLBROOK SQUARE HAS ITS OWN PARKING AND PEOPLE THINK ITS GOOD.THERE IS A GENERAL SHOP ON THE GREEN. WRITTEN BY LEE AND MELISSA
